thread.title: George Clooney's Mom Pulled a Total Mom Move and Revealed the Sexes of His Unborn Twins
thread.title_full: George Clooney's Mom Pulled a Total Mom Move and Revealed the Sexes of His Unborn Twins

author: Brittney Stephens
title: George Clooney's Mom Pulled a Total Mom Move and Revealed the Sexes of His Unborn Twins
text:
Are George Clooney's Twins Boys or Girls? George Clooney's Mom Pulled a Total Mom Move and Revealed the Sexes of His Unborn Twins February 16, 2017 by Brittney Stephens 28 Shares 
You know when your mom shares news about you to her Facebook friends and you weren't totally ready for people to know? That's basically what happened to George Clooney on Thursday when his mom, Nina, revealed the sexes of his unborn twins . The A-list actor and his wife, Amal, are expecting two babies this year , and Nina told Vogue that they'll be having a boy and a girl. "It will be one of each! Yes, a boy and a girl. That's what I've been told." We've heard quite a bit about George and Amal's expanding family, but not straight from them; in addition to George's mom revealing details, his close pal Matt Damon has also opened up about the big news , saying that he "almost cried" upon hearing it. He also appeared on The Ellen DeGeneres Show to joke about George's future "sleepless nights." Related:
